document.masterDocTitle: Updated checklist of Iranian Opiinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Updated checklist of Iranian Opiinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined. 2 ♀, Iran , East Azarbaijan province, Ahar,
38 ° 30 ′N
47 °08′E
,
April 2011
(new record).

Host records.
Liriomyza congesta (Becker, 1903 )
,
L. huidobrensis (Blanchard, 1926 )
;
Phytomyza cineracea Hendel, 1920
,

Hendel, 1920
( Diptera : Agromyzidae );

(Robineau- Desvoidy, 1830 ) ( Diptera : Tephritidae ) (

;
